message: Let's be fair and close the deal!
I understand you want to be fair, but this time I'm offering you the same deal, just with our roles reversed.  Let's close the deal in this round.
You didn't take the fair deal, now it's my turn to propose a slightly better offer for myself.
This is getting us nowhere.  Let's split it evenly and end this.
You should have taken one of the previous deals, now I'm increasing my share.
Alice, I'm serious about ending this. I'm willing to accept a worse deal than my original offer to end this now. Take this deal before inflation eats away at any potential gains for me.
